mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.weixinid AS "weixinid", a.nickname AS "nickname", a.url AS "url", a.token AS "token", a.appid AS "appid", a.appsecret AS "appsecret", a.accesstoken AS "accesstoken", a.jsapiticket AS "jsapiticket", a.partner AS "partner", a.partnerkey AS "partnerkey", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM weixin_info a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.weixinid LIKE '%'||#{weixinid}||'%' '%'+#{weixinid}+'%' concat('%',#{weixinid},'%')
AND a.nickname LIKE '%'||#{nickname}||'%' '%'+#{nickname}+'%' concat('%',#{nickname},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
